p: Evaluating changes in traditional news and social media relied on daily trends for global news articles from the Bloomberg Terminal using the {NT GO} function ( bloomberg.com/professional) and postings on Twitter ( dev.twitter.com/streaming/overview) that included the phrases “climate change” or “global warming” from January 1, 2011 through March 9, 2016. News was plotted on a relative scale (the proportion of all news including the key terms) and Twitter on an absolute scale (all English language tweets including the key terms) since it was only available in this format.
